snippet: The owner of The 530 Shop, one of the few storefronts open on Broadway, in downtown Lorain, Ohio, isn’t sure how long he can last with dwindling sales.
abstract: Lorain Journal; Art Oehkle's vintage store 530 Shop in downtown Lorain, Ohio, is one of the few remaining businesses to remain open on Broadway just before it meets Lake Erie; the mostly abandoned strip is a stark contrast to the town's bustle in the 1950s.
lead_paragraph: The owner of The 530 Shop, one of the few storefronts open on Broadway, in downtown Lorain, Ohio, isn’t sure how long he can last with dwindling sales.

headline.seo: Recession Takes Toll in Lorain, Ohio
headline.main: A Dimly Flickering Light in a Darkened Downtown
headline.print_headline: A Dimly Flickering Light In a Darkened Downtown
